firstSection.description: Boost digital transformation in the education sector with verifiable credentials
firstSection.title: Education

steps.description: Universities face time-consuming processes to verify student identities and certifications for enrollment and mobility, leading to complex application procedures for students and alumni seeking programs or jobs. Additionally, the growing trend toward skills-based education has increased the demand for micro-credentialing, which universities struggle to provide attestations for
steps.title: Challenge

steps.description: Our technology allows universities to ease operational processes by securely issuing, updating, and verifying interoperable digital academic credentials, such as diplomas, transcripts, and student IDs. Students can easily use and share these credentials from their ID Wallet to apply for jobs and programs within seconds, reducing paperwork and the burden on verifiers
steps.title: Solution

thirdSection.description: Streamline processes and generate new opportunities for the entire education ecosystem
